Post jobs and get bids from multiple verified home cleaning service providers, contractors, handymen, and more. Check reviews, message them with any queries, and hire the best one for the job, directly from the app.

Our network of skilled, verified professionals are ready to handle all your home cleaning, plumbing, carpentry, electrical, appliance repair, and house painting needs.

Hiring home service contractors or home cleaning services for work around your property can be hassle-free.

All our home service providers are from the areas near Chicago. They are all vetted and insured through ChoreRelief.

Why ChoreRelief?


- Quick and Easy
- Hassle-Free Experience
- On-Time Arrival & Delivery
- Background-Verified Experts
- Guaranteed Quality of Service
- Transparent and Affordable Pricing
- Trusted by thousands of Americans!
- Provides Everything, from Home Services to Handyman & Maintenance

SAVES YOU TIME
Get help in as little as one hour.

SAVES YOU MONEY
Fair and transparent pricing. Name your own budget.

SAVES YOU HASSLE
Get ChoreRelief verified contractors and pay only once the job is done right. All of our contractors are well-reviewed and carefully screened.

SAVES YOU HEADACHES
Digital paper trail, contracts, and proof of performance are always at your fingertips.

SERVICES



Home Cleaning Services
Discover a range of home cleaning packages to suit your needs. Post jobs for bathroom, bedroom, and kitchen deep cleaning, furniture and furnishing cleaning, floor scrubbing, and polishing services, as well as all-inclusive Full Home Deep Cleaning.

Painting Services
Book interior or exterior house painting jobs for homes of all sizes.

Plumbing Services at Home
Find professional, trained plumbers for all your plumbing issues - leaky pipes, dripping faucets, bathroom fittings, blocked toilets, sanitary work, and more.

Electrical Repair Services at Home
We offer electrical services at home for fitting and removing fans, switchboard installation and replacement, circuit fault finding, all kinds of wiring work, tube lights, other light fitting and removal, and more.

Carpentry Work at Home
Book skilled carpentry services directly from the app to solve all your furniture installation, assembly, and repair problems.

Packers & Movers Services
Moving to a new house? We’re a one-stop-shop for all your end-to-end relocation needs - packing, moving, unpacking, cleaning, painting, plumbing, electrical help - the list goes on!

HOW IT WORKS



Step 1: Input the details and pictures of the job into the app.
Step 2: Once the job details are entered, the property manager can set their ideal budget.
Step 3: The job is shown to dozens of local, vetted contractors who place bids or accept the quoted rate.
Step 4: Review the proposals. Award the job with just a couple of clicks in the app. Work generally begins within an hour.
Step 5: Once the job is completed, property managers can review photos of the completed project and send the final invoice. Make payment securely and easily through the app.

Thinking about a home remodel? Got a construction project that’s stalled? Looking for a moving company? Bathroom in need of repairs? Don’t spend hours calling around for estimates. Let ChoreRelief do the work for you.

Getting everything in one place – that’s what we aim to do.

We created allbetter because we believe everybody should have access to high-quality home repair services and advice, regardless of their location or budget. Right now, finding the best contractor is like going on a safari for the most reliable contractor. You visit different websites, compare reviews from strangers, and then, cross your fingers, you find the right one. With our app, the process is completely reimagined. You get several bids from trustworthy professionals in your local area; you can chat directly with.


Why allbetter?
- Quick and easy to use
- Hassle-free experience
- On-time arrival and delivery
- Background-verified experts and professionals
- Guaranteed quality of service
- Transparent and affordable pricing
- Trusted by thousands of Americans
- Provides a full range of trade services from handyman to remodeling contractor

SAVES YOU TIME
Get help in as little as one hour from a local handyman by using our allbetter app.

SAVES YOU MONEY
Name your budget to save money by hiring a helper for virtually any home service you need.

SAVES YOU HASSLE
Hire allbetter verified contractors and pay only when the job is done right. All of our contractors (including plumbers, electricians, painters, etc. ) are well-reviewed and carefully screened.

SAVES YOU HEADACHES
You'll have a complete digital paper trail, contracts, and proof of performance, always at your fingertips within your online allbetterapp.com account.

POPULAR SERVICES IN THE allbetter APP

Home Cleaning Services
Post jobs for your bathroom update, bedroom paint job, kitchen deep-clean, furniture assembly, floor scrubbing, and even garage cleaning. These are tasks and chores that fly off your to-do list when you engage in efficient help.

Painting Services
Book interior or exterior house painting jobs for any size home, apartment, or small business.

Plumbing Services
Looking for a pro plumber near you? Find professional, trained plumbers for all your plumbing issues easily within reach when you use the allbetter app. And know your price in advance!

Electrical Services
allbetter electricians offer all kinds of services such as fitting and removing ceiling fans, switchboard installation and replacement, circuit fault finding, repairing blown fuses, and wiring work to bring functional electricity where you need it, inside or outside your home.

Carpentry Service
Arrange for skilled carpentry services directly from the allbetter app. You can even send your carpenter pictures of the area where you want your project built, and any drawings or photographs you have as inspiration before they arrive to do the job.

Packers and Movers
Moving to a new house? allbetter is a one-stop app for all your relocation needs, from packing, moving, and unpacking to cleaning, painting, carpentry, plumbing, electrical and other repairs. The list of professionals who can help you is virtually endless, and it's all in one handy place on your phone.

Disclaimer:
Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life

creator: allbetter
descriptionHtml:
When you need a service, and you need to research, interview, and hire a professional contractor, you’re doing this on your own time.
You’re not being paid to be at work.

So wouldn’t it be better if you were able to set the day and time when you wanted the work done?
And wouldn’t it be even better if you were able to set the price you were willing to pay?

And imagine this…being able to text, send photos and videos of your project to bidders so everybody sees and understands exactly what you need? And until you select and hire and the contractor is on the way, nobody sees addresses or phone numbers?

allbetter ensures satisfaction with e-signature and photos for total, verified happiness for everyone.

And no money changes hands between you and contractors– it’s all done through the app securely, safely.

Plus, when you read contractor reviews on the allbetter app, you’ll never have to worry about fake, mystery reviews from anywhere on the web because the reviews you see on the allbetter app are only from other allbetter app customers in your community.

And we quickly kick out any fake, abusive, unprofessional people.

Because we want you to feel safe, secure, and satisfied.

It’s all part of making everything all better.

Home Cleaning Services
Post jobs for your bathroom update, bedroom paint job, kitchen deep-clean, furniture assembly, floor scrubbing, and even garage cleaning. These are tasks and chores that fly off your to-do list when you engage in efficient help.

Painting Services
Book interior or exterior house painting jobs for any size home, apartment, or small business.

title: AllBetter for customers

container.value:
222 W Merchandise Mart Plaza
Suite 1212, Chicago, IL 60654

creator: allbetter
descriptionHtml:
When you need a service, and you need to research, interview, and hire a professional contractor, you’re doing this on your own time.
You’re not being paid to be at work.

So wouldn’t it be better if you were able to set the day and time when you wanted the work done?
And wouldn’t it be even better if you were able to set the price you were willing to pay?

And imagine this…being able to text, send photos and videos of your project to bidders so everybody sees and understands exactly what you need? And until you select and hire and the contractor is on the way, nobody sees addresses or phone numbers?

allbetter ensures satisfaction with e-signature and photos for total, verified happiness for everyone.

And no money changes hands between you and contractors– it’s all done through the app securely, safely.

Plus, when you read contractor reviews on the allbetter app, you’ll never have to worry about fake, mystery reviews from anywhere on the web because the reviews you see on the allbetter app are only from other allbetter app customers in your community.

And we quickly kick out any fake, abusive, unprofessional people.

Because we want you to feel safe, secure, and satisfied.

It’s all part of making everything all better.

Home Cleaning Services
Post jobs for your bathroom update, bedroom paint job, kitchen deep-clean, furniture assembly, floor scrubbing, and even garage cleaning. These are tasks and chores that fly off your to-do list when you engage in efficient help.

Painting Services
Book interior or exterior house painting jobs for any size home, apartment, or small business.

Plumbing Services
Looking for a pro plumber near you? Find professional, trained plumbers for all your plumbing issues easily within reach when you use the allbetter app. And know your price in advance!

Electrical Services
allbetter electricians offer all kinds of services such as fitting and removing ceiling fans, switchboard installation and replacement, circuit fault finding, repairing blown fuses, and wiring work to bring functional electricity where you need it, inside or outside your home.

Carpentry Service
Arrange for skilled carpentry services directly from the allbetter app. You can even send your carpenter pictures of the area where you want your project built, and any drawings or photographs you have as inspiration before they arrive to do the job.

Packers and Movers
Moving to a new house? allbetter is a one-stop app for all your relocation needs, from packing, moving, and unpacking to cleaning, painting, carpentry, plumbing, electrical and other repairs. The list of professionals who can help you is virtually endless, and it's all in one handy place on your phone.

Disclaimer:
Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life
descriptionShort: House cleaning, repair, moving, Handyman and more

descriptionHtml:
No other home services app gives you the control, speed, privacy, and security of AllBetter.
You set the day, time –even the price.

Welcome to the AllBetter way.

We connect you with skilled and vetted neighborhood contractors for everything from furniture assembly, roofing, plumbing, electrical, moving, cleaning, and much, much more.

HOW IT WORKS
1. Tell us what you need help with and choose your day, time – even your budget
2. Get a list of qualified contractors bidding on your project – as early as today
3. Select a contractor based on pricing, reviews, and your schedule
4. Chat, pay, tip, and review – all through one platform with total privacy and security
5. Save your favorites to book again and again

WHY USE ALL BETTER?
• Book help in minutes
• Find same-day help, fast
• You can decide the day, time – even the cost
• Access vetted neighborhood contractors
• Chat with contractors in the app – in privacy, safety, and security
• Total security and privacy – like no other home service app
• Make secure payments via the app
• Get backed by our Total Happiness Pledge
• Contact app support through email, chat, and phone

POPULAR PROJECTS
Neighborhood contractors help tackle your to-do list and make your everyday life easier.
• Furniture Assembly: IKEA furniture, desk, dresser, bed, bookshelf, couch, chair, table, patio furniture
• Mounting & Installation: TV, shelf, cabinet, ceiling fan, lights, smart home, doorbell, air conditioner, curtains, blinds, pictures, photo frames, wallpaper, home theater
• Moving: packing, unpacking, heavy lifting, junk removal, appliance removal, mattress pick-up
• Cleaning: Home, office, gutter, patio, hot tub
• Handyman: Home repairs, maintenance, painting, plumbing, electrical, drywall, carpentry, fence, deck restoration
• Yardwork: Gardening, weed removal, lawn mowing, landscaping, tree trimming

NEED HELP USING ALL BETTER? Reach out to us at https://AllBetterapp.com

LOOKING TO BECOME a Contractor? Learn more at AllBetterapp.com/provider

descriptionHtml:
AllBetter App – Your Home Repair App for Trusted Pros

Need a fix for that leaky faucet or a deep clean before guests arrive? The AllBetter App connects you with vetted handymen, cleaners, and contractors near you—fast! From plumbing to painting, landscaping to electrical, this home repair app makes hiring pros a breeze. Say goodbye to endless searches and hello to reliable help in minutes.

Key Features:
• Wide Services: Book experts for cleaning, repairs, plumbing, and more—all in one place.
• Trusted Pros: Identity-verified contractors, many background-checked, for your peace of mind.
• Post Jobs Easy: Share your needs, set a budget, and get matched with local talent.
• Compare Bids: Pick the best contractor for your timeline and wallet.
• In-App Chat: Ask questions or confirm details—no phone hassle.
• Secure Payments: Pay via escrow—funds released only when you’re happy.
• Real Reviews: Check ratings from homeowners like you and add your own.

Why AllBetter Stands Out:
• Fast: Find help in clicks, not days—perfect for urgent fixes.
• Affordable: Set your price and get competitive bids from trusted pros.
• Convenient: Manage every step in this cleaning services app—no stress.

Who’s It For?
• Homeowners: Maintain or upgrade your home with ease.
• Landlords: Hire pros for repairs and upkeep across properties.
• Busy Pros: Too slammed to search? We’ve got you covered.

Get Started Now!
Transform your home with the home repair app homeowners trust. Download AllBetter today and book a handyman, cleaner, or contractor for your next project—big or small!

• Hire handyman near me
• Local contractors for home
• Book cleaners fast
• Affordable home fixes
• Plumbing & electrical pros

• Find contractors easily
• Trusted home services
• Best app for home help
